dts_vmss_rule_name: EC2 VPC Peering should not have cross account connection
dts_wiz_rule_name: VPC peering communication should be only between AWS VPCs who are members of the same AWS account

dts_vmss_rule_name: SNS topic should have encryption enabled
dts_wiz_rule_name: SNS Topic Server-Side Encryption (SSE) should be enabled

dts_vmss_rule_name: EC2 VPC default security group should restrict all access
dts_wiz_rule_name: Default Security Group attached to a VPC should not allow all traffic

dts_vmss_rule_name: Elastic Load Balancer should have one or more listeners configured
dts_wiz_rule_name: Elastic Load Balancer should use SSL listeners

dts_vmss_rule_name: WAFv2 web ACL should have rules defined
dts_wiz_rule_name: WAF Web ACL default action is set to allow requests that do not match any rules

dts_vmss_rule_name: CloudFront distribution field-level encryption should be enabled
dts_wiz_rule_name: CloudFront encrypted data in transit should use TLS version 1.2 or higher

dts_vmss_rule_name: CloudFront distribution should be attached to WAF
dts_wiz_rule_name: CloudFront distribution should be associated with a WAF web ACL

dts_vmss_rule_name: EC2 security group should restrict public access
dts_wiz_rule_name: EC2 Security Group should restrict uncommon ports access

dts_vmss_rule_name: Classic Load Balancer should have access logs enabled
dts_wiz_rule_name: Classic Load Balancer access logging should be enabled

dts_vmss_rule_name: EC2 security group should restrict public access to FTP control port (21)
dts_wiz_rule_name: EC2 Security Group should restrict FTP access (TCP:21)

dts_vmss_rule_name: Elastic Load Balancer should not have invalid HTTP headers
dts_wiz_rule_name: Application Load Balancer should drop invalid headers

dts_vmss_rule_name: EKS cluster should restrict public access
dts_wiz_rule_name: EKS Cluster endpoint public access should be disabled

dts_vmss_rule_name: ACM should not have a certificate with a wildcard domain
dts_wiz_rule_name: ACM certificate domain name should not contain a wildcard

dts_vmss_rule_name: EC2 security group should restrict public access over IPv4 to SSH port (22)
dts_wiz_rule_name: EC2 Security Group should restrict SSH access (TCP:22)

dts_vmss_rule_name: EKS control plane should have controller manager logging enabled
dts_wiz_rule_name: EKS Cluster control plane logging should be enabled for all logging types

dts_vmss_rule_name: OpenSearch application logging should be enabled
dts_wiz_rule_name: OpenSearch (ElasticSearch) domain logs should be enabled

dts_vmss_rule_name: Classic Load Balancer should have cross-zone load balancing enabled
dts_wiz_rule_name: Classic Load Balancer cross-zone load balancing should be enabled

dts_vmss_rule_name: EKS control plane should have scheduler logging enabled
dts_wiz_rule_name: EKS Cluster control plane logging should be enabled for all logging types

dts_vmss_rule_name: OpenSearch search slow logging should be enabled
dts_wiz_rule_name: OpenSearch (ElasticSearch) domain search slow logs should be enabled

dts_vmss_rule_name: OpenSearch index slow logging should be enabled
dts_wiz_rule_name: OpenSearch (ElasticSearch) domain index slow logs should be enabled

dts_vmss_rule_name: OpenSearch service domain should restrict public access
dts_wiz_rule_name: OpenSearch (ElasticSearch) domain should not be publicly accessible

dts_vmss_rule_name: EKS control plane should have authenticator logging enabled
dts_wiz_rule_name: EKS Cluster control plane logging should be enabled for all logging types

dts_vmss_rule_name: OpenSearch policy should not allow unrestricted access for all users
dts_wiz_rule_name: OpenSearch (ElasticSearch) domain policy should not be overly permissive

dts_vmss_rule_name: EKS control plane should have audit logging enabled
dts_wiz_rule_name: EKS Cluster control plane logging should be enabled for all logging types

dts_vmss_rule_name: EKS control plane should have API logging enabled
dts_wiz_rule_name: EKS Cluster control plane logging should be enabled for all logging types

dts_vmss_rule_name: EC2 instance should not use default VPC
dts_wiz_rule_name: EC2 instance should not use the default VPC

dts_vmss_rule_name: CloudTrail log file should be encrypted
dts_wiz_rule_name: CloudTrail logs should be encrypted with SSE-KMS

dts_vmss_rule_name: EC2 instance should not have a public IP address
dts_wiz_rule_name: EC2 instance should not have a public IP address

dts_vmss_rule_name: SNS topic policy should restrict access to required users
dts_wiz_rule_name: SNS Topic policy should not allow all principals
